exercises.explanation: For repeated, habitual actions ('svaki dan' - every day), we use the imperfective aspect. 'Ide' expresses ongoing, regular action.
The verb 'pročitala' (perfective) indicates that Ana completed reading the book. The perfective aspect emphasizes the completion of the action.
The act of seeing someone at a specific time in the past is typically expressed with perfective aspect 'vidio', indicating a completed, momentary action.
Future actions that represent a single, completed transaction typically use perfective aspect. 'Kupiti' indicates the completion of buying a car.
Habitual actions ('svako jutro' - every morning) use imperfective aspect. 'Trči' expresses the ongoing, repeated nature of the activity.

exercises.text: On je _____ zadatak za pet minuta.
exercises.explanation: The time limit 'za pet minuta' (in five minutes) suggests completion. The perfective 'riješio' indicates the task was successfully completed.
